sex.legend: This is the sex that is on the identity document you used in your most recent visa application.

country-of-nationality.label: This is the country of nationality shown on the identity document you used in your most recent visa application. Use the English spelling or the country code.

dob.legend: You should enter this as shown on the identity document you used in your most recent visa application.

anything-else.label: Is there anything else you can tell us that may help us find your record?
anything-else.hint: For example, if you have ever had another name or nationality. Or if you have a reference number which you have tried using to get access to your eVisa.
